description: Heap-based buffer overflow in the nsSVGFEDiffuseLightingElement::LightPixel function in Mozilla Firefox 4.x through 11.0, Firefox ESR 10.x before 10.0.4, Thunderbird 5.0 through 11.0, Thunderbird ESR 10.x before 10.0.4, and SeaMonkey before 2.9 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (invalid gfxImageSurface free operation) or possibly execute arbitrary code by leveraging the use of "different number systems."

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2012-0470

description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Mozilla Firefox 4.x through 11.0, Firefox ESR 10.x before 10.0.4, Thunderbird 5.0 through 11.0, Thunderbird ESR 10.x before 10.0.4, and SeaMonkey before 2.9 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via a multibyte character set.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2012-0471

description: The cairo-dwrite implementation in Mozilla Firefox 4.x through 11.0, Firefox ESR 10.x before 10.0.4, Thunderbird 5.0 through 11.0, Thunderbird ESR 10.x before 10.0.4, and SeaMonkey before 2.9, when certain Windows Vista and Windows 7 configurations are used, does not properly restrict font-rendering attempts, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (memory corruption) or possibly execute arbitrary code via unspecified vectors.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2012-0472

description: The WebGLBuffer::FindMaxUshortElement function in Mozilla Firefox 4.x through 11.0, Firefox ESR 10.x before 10.0.4, Thunderbird 5.0 through 11.0, Thunderbird ESR 10.x before 10.0.4, and SeaMonkey before 2.9 calls the FindMaxElementInSubArray function with incorrect template arguments, which allows remote attackers to obtain sensitive information from video memory via a crafted WebGL.drawElements call.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2012-0473

description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the docshell implementation in Mozilla Firefox 4.x through 11.0, Firefox ESR 10.x before 10.0.4, Thunderbird 5.0 through 11.0, Thunderbird ESR 10.x before 10.0.4, and SeaMonkey before 2.9 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via vectors related to short-circuited page loads, aka "Universal XSS (UXSS)."

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2012-0474

description: Mozilla Firefox 4.x through 11.0, Thunderbird 5.0 through 11.0, and SeaMonkey before 2.9 do not properly construct the Origin and Sec-WebSocket-Origin HTTP headers, which might allow remote attackers to bypass an IPv6 literal ACL via a cross-site (1) XMLHttpRequest or (2) WebSocket operation involving a nonstandard port number and an IPv6 address that contains certain zero fields.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2012-0475

description: Multiple cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities in Mozilla Firefox 4.x through 11.0, Firefox ESR 10.x before 10.0.4, Thunderbird 5.0 through 11.0, Thunderbird ESR 10.x before 10.0.4, and SeaMonkey before 2.9 allow remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the (1) ISO-2022-KR or (2) ISO-2022-CN character set.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2012-0477

description: The texImage2D implementation in the WebGL subsystem in Mozilla Firefox 4.x through 11.0, Firefox ESR 10.x before 10.0.4, Thunderbird 5.0 through 11.0, Thunderbird ESR 10.x before 10.0.4, and SeaMonkey before 2.9 does not properly restrict JSVAL_TO_OBJECT casts, which might allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted web page.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2012-0478

description: Mozilla Firefox 4.x through 11.0, Firefox ESR 10.x before 10.0.4, Thunderbird 5.0 through 11.0, Thunderbird ESR 10.x before 10.0.4, and SeaMonkey before 2.9 allow remote attackers to spoof the address bar via an https URL for invalid (1) RSS or (2) Atom XML content.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2012-0479

description: Heap-based buffer overflow in the Ole API in the CQOle ActiveX control in cqole.dll in IBM Rational ClearQuest 7.1.1 before 7.1.1.9, 7.1.2 before 7.1.2.6, and 8.0.0 before 8.0.0.2 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted web page that leverages a RegisterSchemaRepoFromFileByDbSet function-prototype mismatch.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2012-0708

description: Adobe Flash Player before 11.2.202.229 in Google Chrome before 18.0.1025.151 allow attackers to cause a denial of service (memory corruption) or possibly have unspecified other impact via unknown vectors, a different vulnerability than CVE-2012-0725.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2012-0724

description: Adobe Flash Player before 11.2.202.229 in Google Chrome before 18.0.1025.151 allow attackers to cause a denial of service (memory corruption) or possibly have unspecified other impact via unknown vectors, a different vulnerability than CVE-2012-0724.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2012-0725

description: The default configuration of TLS in IBM Tivoli Directory Server (TDS) 6.3 and earlier supports the (1) NULL-MD5 and (2) NULL-SHA ciphers, which allows remote attackers to trigger unencrypted communication via the TLS Handshake Protocol.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2012-0726

description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the Web Admin Tool in IBM Tivoli Directory Server (TDS) 6.2 before 6.2.0.22 and 6.3 before 6.3.0.11 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via unspecified vectors.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2012-0740

description: IBM Tivoli Event Pump 4.2.2, when the LOG_REQUESTS and VALIDATE_SOAP_USERS options are enabled, places credentials into the AOPSCLOG (aka AOPLOG) data set, which allows local users to obtain sensitive information by reading the data.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2012-0742

description: IBM Tivoli Directory Server (TDS) 6.3 and earlier allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (daemon crash) via a malformed LDAP paged search request.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2012-0743

description: Integer overflow in Adobe Reader and Acrobat 9.x before 9.5.1 and 10.x before 10.1.3 allows attackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted TrueType font.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2012-0774
